item.title: [Resolved] Longer response times
item.description: You may notice longer response times for your Packit jobs during certain intervals. We are trying to fix the root cause and apologize for the inconvenience!
item.content: You may notice longer response times for your Packit jobs during certain intervals. We are trying to fix the root cause and apologize for the inconvenience!

item.title: [Resolved] Outage
item.description: There has been a Packit outage. The jobs in the queue are now being picked up again and should be processed gradually (you might have experienced a delay in job execution). We are very sorry for the inconvenience!
item.content: There has been a Packit outage. The jobs in the queue are now being picked up again and should be processed gradually (you might have experienced a delay in job execution). We are very sorry for the inconvenience!

item.title: [Resolved] Outage
item.description: There has been a Packit outage. We are investigating the reason of it. The jobs in the queue are now being picked up again and should be processed gradually (you might have experienced a delay in job execution). We are very sorry for the inconvenience!
item.content: There has been a Packit outage. We are investigating the reason of it. The jobs in the queue are now being picked up again and should be processed gradually (you might have experienced a delay in job execution). We are very sorry for the inconvenience!

item.title: [Resolved] Packit outage now resolved
item.description: There has been a Packit outage now resolved. If your jobs are stuck, please retrigger them. We are sorry for the inconvenience.
item.content: There has been a Packit outage now resolved. If your jobs are stuck, please retrigger them. We are sorry for the inconvenience.
